chart.title: Documents Accessed Outside Working Hours
chart.searchString: | pivot ri_pas_datamodel Invalid_Time_Access count(Invalid_Time_Access) AS count SPLITROW _time AS _time PERIOD auto SORT 0 _time ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 0 SHOWOTHER 1

table.title: Top Users
table.searchString: | pivot ri_pas_datamodel Invalid_Time_Access count(Invalid_Time_Access) AS count SPLITROW user AS user SORT 0 user ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 0 SHOWOTHER 1

table.title: Top Documents
table.searchString: | pivot ri_pas_datamodel Invalid_Time_Access count(Invalid_Time_Access) AS count SPLITROW object AS object SORT 100 object ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 0 SHOWOTHER 1
